title: Vuelta a España Stage 7: Wout van Aert Makes Bulldozing Sprint After Breathless GC Finale
content:
Kuss helps lead Van Aert to Belgian's second victory of La Vuelta, O'Connor defends red through a series of late GC skirmishes.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 7: Wout van Aert Makes Bulldozing Sprint After Breathless GC Finale on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
